text: Asɨzir me maketɨn amadir manaba, ia dar amɨ. Ia navir averiamɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribar amu, tintinimɨn azangsɨghan markɨ, a deragh o a ikufi. Puvatɨ.(10:25) Dughiar mabar me asɨziba marvir guabar ofa gamua, egha gɨn da isa ghua maketɨn da amadi. Ezɨ Pol kamagh mɨgei, Kraisɨn adarazi maketɨn ivezir asɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh osɨman markɨ, egh suam, me dar amegh, egh me paza damigham. Puvatɨ. Me dar amam.
